com.android.apksig.apk

Class ApkUtils

  • java.lang.Object

  • public abstract class ApkUtils
extends Object
    APK utilities.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ApkUtils.ZipSections
      Information about the ZIP sections of an APK.

      Finds the main ZIP sections of the provided APK.
      static int getMinSdkVersionFromBinaryAndroidManifest(ByteBuffer androidManifestContents)
      Returns the lowest Android platform version (API Level) supported by an APK with the provided AndroidManifest.xml.

    • Method Detail

      • findZipSections

        public static ApkUtils.ZipSections findZipSections(DataSource apk)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   ZipFormatException
        Finds the main ZIP sections of the provided APK.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurred while reading the APK
        ZipFormatException - if the APK is malformed

      • setZipEocdCentralDirectoryOffset

        public static void setZipEocdCentralDirectoryOffset(ByteBuffer zipEndOfCentralDirectory,
                                                    long offset)
        Sets the offset of the start of the ZIP Central Directory in the APK's ZIP End of Central Directory record.
        Parameters:
        zipEndOfCentralDirectory - APK's ZIP End of Central Directory record
        offset - offset of the ZIP Central Directory relative to the start of the archive. Must be between 0 and 2^32 - 1 inclusive.

      • getMinSdkVersionFromBinaryAndroidManifest

        public static int getMinSdkVersionFromBinaryAndroidManifest(ByteBuffer androidManifestContents)
                                                     throws MinSdkVersionException
        Returns the lowest Android platform version (API Level) supported by an APK with the provided AndroidManifest.xml.
        Parameters:
        androidManifestContents - contents of AndroidManifest.xml in binary Android resource format
        Throws:
        MinSdkVersionException - if an error occurred while determining the API Level
